thread.title: In frightened Mexico town, a mob kills 2 young pollsters
thread.title_full: In frightened Mexico town, a mob kills 2 young pollsters

title: In frightened Mexico town, a mob kills 2 young pollsters
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
It was evening in Ajalpan when two young pollsters from Mexico's capital ducked into a store to conduct a survey about tortilla consumption....
